timelineItems.name: Cuki Georgiev
timelineItems.text: Croatia have to be more aggressive and attack more! Do not expect to look so afraid! #WorldCup #BRAvsCRO

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Croatia. Conceded by Dani Alves.

timelineItems.name: Matt Sliko
timelineItems.text: Croatia's not getting any breaks. #BRAvCRO #WC2014

timelineItems.comment: Hernanes (Brazil) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dejan Lovren (Croatia).
Luiz Gustavo (Brazil) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ante Rebic (Croatia).

timelineItems.name: Amy Merksamer
timelineItems.text: #WorldCup starts up, productivity in every office around the world goes down. #WorldCup2014 #soccer #futbol #goteam #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: james worrall
timelineItems.text: Looks like the whole world is supporting Croatia right now. They have been robbed #WorldCup #brazil2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Luka Modric (Croatia) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Marcelo Brozovic.

timelineItems.name: #ScandalOfGrace
timelineItems.text: Brazil needs to step up their game if they are to go anywhere in this tournament. Smh. #Brazil2014

timelineItems.comment: Luka Modric (Croatia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Luiz Gustavo (Brazil).
Attempt missed. Vedran Corluka (Croatia) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Luka Modric with a cross following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Whittyy.
timelineItems.text: What I took from that game, Oscar ran the game, Neymar can't pass, and Brazil are not gonna win the world cup. #BRAvsCRO #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Paulinho (Brazil) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Neymar.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Think they all got their shot? #BRAvCRO http://t.co/roWQM8Fu8C

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Think they all got their shot? #BRAvCRO http://t.co/roWQM8Fu8C

timelineItems.title: Attempt blocked. Paulinho (Brazil) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Neymar.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Brazil. Conceded by Sime Vrsaljko.

timelineItems.name: Matt Cicco
timelineItems.text: C'mon Croatia pull off the upset #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Jackie
timelineItems.text: Soccer fans have got to be the loudest fans. Impressive. #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Alex Batt
timelineItems.text: Tell you what, Olic should have scored there! #WorldCup #BrazilvsCroatia

timelineItems.comment: Luiz Gustavo (Brazil) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ivan Rakitic (Croatia).

timelineItems.name: Sayo Oladeji
timelineItems.text: That was mad Gustavo #BRAvsCRO

timelineItems.name: The Football Sack
timelineItems.text: Interesting to note that Neymar has now equaled the amount of goals Ronaldinho has scored for Brazil at the age of 22. #BRAvsCRO

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Ivan Perisic (Croatia) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Luka Modric.
Attempt blocked. Marcelo Brozovic (Croatia) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: MUDDIIIIEEEE
timelineItems.text: Oscar has easily been man of the match regardless of that goal #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: Status Marvin
timelineItems.text: I said Oscar was killing it!! #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: Menzi Luthuli
timelineItems.text: Classic one #Brazil2014

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Brazil 3, Croatia 1.
Attempt missed. Marcelo Brozovic (Croatia) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Luka Modric.
